mapper.sql: id AS id, title AS title, dept_id AS deptId, content AS content, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, days AS days, leave_type as leaveType, status as status, create_time AS createTime, create_By AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_By AS updateBy

select l.id AS id, l.title AS title, l.dept_id as deptId, l.content AS content, l.start_time AS startTime, l.end_time AS endTime, l.days as days, l.create_time AS createTime, l.leave_type as leaveType, m.name as status, u.name AS createBy from t_leave l left join sys_dict m on m.code = l.status and m.pid = (select id from sys_dict where code="leave_status") left join sys_user u on u.id=l.create_by left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id
mapper.select:
where l.status = 1
and (l.start_time >= CONCAT(#{leave.startTime},' 00:00:00'))
and (l.end_time <= CONCAT(#{leave.endTime},' 23:59:59'))
and (l.content like CONCAT('%',#{leave.content},'%') or l.title like CONCAT('%',#{leave.content},'%') or u.name like CONCAT('%',#{leave.content},'%'))
${leave.params.dataScope}
order by l.create_time desc
